pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multiple Grubbs-Beck Low-Outlier Test // Compute the multiple Grubbs-Beck low-outlier test on positively distributed data and utilities for noninterpretive U.S. Geological Survey annual peak-streamflow data processing discussed in Cohn et al. (2013) doi:10.1002/wrcr.20392 and England et al. (2017) doi:10.3133/tm4B5.
